# MLHandPoseClassifier.ImageAugmentationOptions

**Structure**

Options a hand pose classification training session can use to generate additional training data from the images you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ImageAugmentationOptions
```

## Augmentations supporting types

- **horizontallyFlip**: Apply left-right flips to the pose in an image.
- **rotate**: Randomly rotate the pose in an image.
- **scale**: Randomly scale the pose in an image.
- **translate**: Randomly translate the pose in an image.
- **Option set support**: Inspect and modify a video augmentation option set with the properties and methods it inherits from standard protocols.

## Creating image augmentation options

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an option set from an integer.

## Supporting types

- **MLHandPoseClassifier.DataSource**: A hand pose classifier dataset that contains annotated images or hand joint location data.
- **MLHandPoseClassifier.ModelParameters**: A set of parameters that affect the training process of a hand pose classifier task.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
